description: SUPPORT TO THE TAJIKISTAN NATIONAL MINE ACTION PLAN

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description:
Project Title: Communities are free from Mine Hazards;
1.Sustainable, national institutions are able to plan, coordinate and implement a comprehensive national Mine Action program and comply with the Ottawa convention.
2.At least 200,000 m² of hazardous land is annually returned to communities at a cost of less than $6 per metre
3.Capacity for mine risk education is build in the Ministry of Education and in mine-affected communities
4.Capacity for mine risk education is build in the Ministry of Education and in mine-affected communities
5.The impact of landmine accidents on individuals is reduced
6.UNDP’s contribution to mine action in Tajikistan is evaluated
donor_long: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: Communities free of mine hazar
